title: Adele Is Back. Everything Has Changed Since She Ruled the Music Business.
sub_head: With a new single and her fourth album on the way, the top-selling artist of the 2010s dives back into an industry transformed by streaming
body:
The last time Adele released an album, Barack Obama was president and streaming was a niche format that hadn’t yet taken over the music industry.
Six years later, after a long stretch out of the spotlight, the British superstar is back with a new single, “Easy on Me,” out Thursday, and she is expected to release a new album soon.
